thread.title: 'If you're watching this, I'm dead,' says George 'The Animal' Steele in pre-recorded video
thread.title_full: 'If you're watching this, I'm dead,' says George 'The Animal' Steele in pre-recorded video

author: Benjamin Raven | braven@mlive.com
title: 'If you're watching this, I'm dead,' says George 'The Animal' Steele in pre-recorded video
text: George Steele, real name William James Myers, was inducted into the WWE Hall of Fame in 1995, and the Michigan High School Coaches Association Hall of Fame in 1996. In 2012, Madison Heights named its football field Jim Myers Stadium for his 25 years of coaching football, track and wrestling at the school.
